name: DreamLeaf
description:
Welcome to the world of DreamLeaf! 

DreamLeaf is an exciting character-focused board game, designed to be played with friends. 

Venture the land of dreams in search of creatures to fill the dreams of your people in the world below. Compete against your friends to build the largest Dream Kingdom! But beware of Morbheus, the god of dreams, who is easily unsettled...he won’t be happy if you cannot cooperate.

Features include (but are not limited to):

  • A competitive AND cooperative multiplayer experience!?
  • Cute dreamy garden aesthetic
  • A plethora of lovable characters
  • An even bigger plethora of story moments
  • An opportunity to put your voice acting skills into practice!
  • chaos.

Package includes:

  • Virtual Game Master
  • Text file with links to the board (in the website Roll20)
    • You have to open one of these links to play!
  • A sheet of Key Terms to help you if you get stuck

We recommend using Discord/Zoom, as one person is required to stream the Virtual Game Master  whilst all players are accessing the board.
